panel.name: body
panel.component:
Components
Part of the Rennder Platform

All of the content on every single web page in the Rennder Platform is made up of Components, which are loaded onto Interfaces. The capabilities of a Component can be endless. When combined with RML, a Component can look beautiful. When built for an Application, a Component can be powerful. Even the most basic components are extremely powerful, like the Text Box, Menu, and Object components.
